title: Fintech Loan Monitoring Dashboard
subtitle: Performance-optimized loan portfolio management system
problem: A financial services company needed a modern, performant dashboard to monitor thousands of loans in real-time. The existing system was slow, had poor UX for filtering and sorting, and couldn't handle large datasets efficiently. Load times exceeded 4 seconds, and the Lighthouse score was below 75.
solution: Built a high-performance React dashboard with virtualized table rendering, real-time KPI calculations, and interactive data visualizations. Implemented virtual scrolling to efficiently render 1,000+ rows, memoized expensive computations, and created custom SVG charts to avoid heavy charting library dependencies. Used TypeScript for type safety and Tailwind CSS for rapid, maintainable styling.

outcomes.description: Reduced from 342KB to 187KB through code splitting and lightweight dependencies
Initial load time reduced from 4.2s to 1.8s
Smooth virtualized scrolling with no performance degradation

techHighlights.title: Virtual Scrolling
techHighlights.description: Implemented react-window for efficient rendering of large datasets, rendering only visible rows to maintain 60fps scrolling performance.

techHighlights.title: Custom SVG Charts
techHighlights.description: Built lightweight, responsive charts using native SVG instead of heavy charting libraries, reducing bundle size by 120KB.

techHighlights.title: Smart Memoization
techHighlights.description: Used React.useMemo and useCallback strategically to prevent unnecessary recalculations of filtered data and KPI metrics.

techHighlights.title: Animated KPIs
techHighlights.description: Created custom useAnimatedCounter hook with easing functions for smooth, professional number animations on dashboard load.

techHighlights.title: Type-Safe Architecture
techHighlights.description: Full TypeScript implementation with strict mode enabled, providing compile-time safety and excellent developer experience.

techHighlights.title: Automated Testing
techHighlights.description: Comprehensive test suite with Vitest and Puppeteer for unit tests and automated screenshot generation.
